text: Yesli by ne bylo tak otvratitel'no ot togo, chto vse lyudi stanut nevernymi, uvidev, chto nevernyye v blagodenstvii i blagodati, to My dlya tekh, kto ne veruyet v Milostivogo, sdelali by kryshi domov i lestnitsy, po kotorym oni podnimayutsya, iz serebra, poskol'ku eta zhizn' dlya Nas - nichtozhna
